title: My final year exams are on hold due to pandemic, but SSC has released its application for CPO and a degree is mandatory. What should I do in this case? What does equivalent to graduation mean? - Quora
tags: Staff Selection Commission Combined Graduate Level Exam

response.answer_text: All of you must have read SSC CPO exam notification. As per notification, your final year exam result must have declared on or before 01.01.2021. It's 28.06.2020 today. Completely, six months ahead. First and best scenario - your final year exam announced to be held in the month of July. How much time will result take?? Normally it's 2 or 3 months. Right?? Moreover, Universities are too under much pressure to conduct examnination soon and start new sessions. So, the process will be fast. Waaoo, your result is announced in September or October. Still you have 2 or 3 months for CPO exam.Second scenario: Final year exams held in Aaugst. Result announced in October or November. Still you have 1 or 2 months ahead.Third scenario: Final year exam held in September. Result announced in November or December. Still you have 1 month or are on safer side.Fourth and risky scenario: your final year exam held in October. Results can be announced upto the end of December or later.Worst case scenario: your exams are in November or December.Now, lemme inform you that University of Rajasthan has announced that final year exams will be conducted from 15 July. Though, time table is awaited. Other universities may also conduct the examinations during August or at max upto end of September. So, guys, don't panic. Despite, keep on preparing for your exams. Lastly, SSC is aware of current situation, that's why the deadline of results is 01.01.2021. Equivalent to graduation: There are so many courses after 10+2. The courses which are considered equal to graduation or bachelor degree, are equivalent to graduation. Therefore, you will find the equivalent word whereever required qualification is 'graduation in any field'.

If your final result comes before 1 jan 2021, then you can apply as per notification. First, you should apply the CPO exam as it is 100rs only. Second, You shoud write a mail to SSC informing them about your Univ. exam delay due to Covid-19 and keep a record of mail copy for future reference. At last, you should keep ready for your graduation final year exam. If it is conducted and the result is declared before 1Jan2021, then you will automatically eligible for that.
